name: Dino Dan - Dig Sites
description: The hit TV show Dino Dana brings you this fun fossil finding game! You can play as Dana, Trek, or Dan. First you choose where in the world you want to dig for fossils. Once you're there, you can dig out big chunks of earth to find buried fossils. The goal is to complete a dino skeleton, BUT you have to find ALL the bones before you can finish. When you've finished your dino skeleton you'll see a cool picture of the living dino. You can also open the dino field guide for fun facts about the dinosaur you've just built!
